thread.section_title: Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful management and staff
thread.title_full: Wonderful management and staff - Review of Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Sonia O
title: Wonderful management and staff
text:
This hotel staff are very friendly and helpful. I had a question about some souvenirs from a nearby market. I asked staff and management, and they went above and beyond to help us!!! Thank you Protea Entebbe.
Also the view is unbeatable, next to Lake Victoria. The place is clean and organized. The front desk are professional and kind. All around a great choice.
